urls.title: Consultation launched on new nuclear power station design proposed for UK
urls.description: The Environment Agency is consulting on its assessment of the UK Hualong Pressurised water reactor design.

text: This week, @EnvAgency has begun a public consultation on the UK Hualong Pressurised water Reactor (UK HPR1000) as part of its ongoing Generic Design Assessment. The consultation runs until Sunday 4 April 2021. #NuclearNewBuild More info: https://t.co/SMYn6wEvzj

urls.description: The Environment Agency seeksÂ views on a new nuclear power station designÂ as it publishes its assessment so far of the UK Hualong Pressurised water Reactor (UK HPR1000).
